Generation V.Black: When its internal fire is burning, it cannot calm down and it runs around. When the fire diminishes, it falls asleep.
Generation V.White: Darumaka's droppings are hot, so people used to put them in their clothes to keep themselves warm.
Generation V.Black 2: When it sleeps, it pulls its limbs into its body and its internal fire goes down to 1,100° F .
Generation V.White 2: When it sleeps, it pulls its limbs into its body and its internal fire goes down to 1,100° F .

Generation VI.X: Darumaka's droppings are hot, so people used to put them in their clothes to keep themselves warm.
Generation VI.Y: When it sleeps, it pulls its limbs into its body and its internal fire goes down to 1,100 degrees Fahrenheit .
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Darumaka's droppings are hot, so people used to put them in their clothes to keep themselves warm.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: When it sleeps, it pulls its limbs into its body and its internal fire goes down to 1,100 degrees Fahrenheit .

Generation VIII.Sword: It lived in snowy areas for so long that its fire sac cooled off and atrophied. It now has an organ that generates cold instead.
Generation VIII.Shield: The colder they get, the more energetic they are. They freeze their breath to make snowballs, using them as ammo for playful snowball fights.

Generation V.White 2: Route 4 , Desert Resort Desert Resort ( N's Pokémon )
